Busta Rhymes Falls Off Stage While Headbanging to O.T. Genasis’ “Coco”

posted by Confusion on November 29, 2014 in Video

O.T. Genasis’ “Coco” is one of those songs that makes everybody lose their shit. Busta Rhymes has been hitting the stage with O.T. and performing the song with him regularly, but the power of “Coco” still has an effect on Busta. During a show at Webster Hall in New York City, Busta was headbanging so hard to the track that he fell off stage and cut his head open.

Busta is in good spirits, though. “A record ain’t make me do that in years,” he tweeted after the incident.

« PreviousShift + ← Next »Shift + → 1 of

“This is what happen when #THECONGLOMERATE money starts changing and when we got the hottest record in the country” Congrats 2 O.T.@GENASISISHERE #Coco on Itunes now!!! YO WIZ @mistercap I THINK MY STAGE DIVE WAS BETTER THAN YOURS. LMFAO.

A video posted by Busta Rhymes (@conglomerateent) on Nov 11, 2014 at 3:29pm PST
